Class BirthdayProgram

java.lang.Object
BirthdayProgram
public class BirthdayProgram extends Object
The BirthdayProgram class is responsible for calculating the probability that 2 people share the same birthday in a class. It does this through running a configurable amount of trials.
Author:
Rachel Hussmann

  • Method Details

    • runTrials

      public double runTrials(int trials, int people)
      The runTrials method runs the configurable number of trials and figures out the percentage of birthday matches in a class.
      Parameters:
      trials - The number of trials to be run.
      people - The number of people in the class.
      Returns:
      The decimal percentage of birthday matches.

    • checkForBirthday

      public boolean checkForBirthday(Person person1, Person person2)
      The checkForBirthday method checks to see if two Person objects share the same birthday.
      Parameters:
      person1 - A Person object to compare against person2.
      person2 - A Person object to compare against person1.
      Returns:
      True - if the two Person objects share the same birthday (Month and Day) False - if the two objects do not share a birthday
